...Penney Garrett...

Home About Artwork Github Website Instagram

Penney has an eclectic background that spans
the globe and includes things like organic farming,
goat tending, almond and olive harvesting, international
art residencies, clinical herbalism and nutrition training,
rock climbing, brewing and fermenting, mushroom hunting,
personal chefing, and other general oddities.

Her current endeavor involves being a more-than-full-time
student at the Turing School of Software and Design,
studying something weird they call "full stack web development".

It is by far the strangest and most difficult thing she has done thus far.
